thread.title: Stephen Colbert Plays InfoWars’ Alex Jones's Greatest Hits
thread.title_full: Stephen Colbert Plays InfoWars’ Alex Jones's Greatest Hits

title: Stephen Colbert Plays InfoWars’ Alex Jones's Greatest Hits
text:
From chart toppers like “The Sandy Hook mass shooting was a false-flag event staged by the government” to lesser known B-sides like “the inside of juice boxes are turning all your sons gay,” you’ll be tapping your toes and fearing for the future of humanity to this medley of conspiracy theorist Alex Jones’s greatest hits. Stephen Colbert put together a montage of the InfoWars anchor’s most unhinged fabrications, and it’s the perfect background music to your realization that President Trump respects and has a relationship with a man who genuinely believes two-thirds of the frogs down in Houston are bisexual. Everyone KNOWS it’s 100 percent.
Tags: last night on late night stephen colbert the late show with stephen colbert alex jones infowars tv conspiracy theories More Stephen Colbert Plays InfoWars’ Alex Jones’s Greatest Hits   Video Games Are Better Than Real Life   Latest News from Vulture 10:06 a.m. Stephen Colbert Plays the Greatest Hits of InfoWars’ Alex Jones Sorry, America. We all have to know about Alex Jones now.
